ns:common.topic.description: Prospero Pascal is an ISO 10206-compatible Pascal compiler, produced by Prospero Software of England. The current compiler is for Extended Pascal under Windows. It is the only compiler in existence that fully implements the ISO 10206 standard for Extended Pascal. This is the ISO extension of standard Pascal, which was standardized as ISO 7185.
rdfs:label: Prospero Pascal

ns:common.document.text: Prospero Pascal is an ISO 10206-compatible Pascal compiler, produced by Prospero Software of England. The current compiler is for Extended Pascal under Windows. It is the only compiler in existence that fully implements the ISO 10206 standard for Extended Pascal. This is the ISO extension of standard Pascal, which was standardized as ISO 7185.
